X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=233180667; y=qBHUGiCtiyWA3xp8kiYO5EYzKzuYYvRsV2_3yuo_UB19gEABZjbVNA

> Because Heritrix WebUI is over http instead of https our institution
> is requiring us to use X server apps (Xming) on our PCs for access,
> which in turn has a negative impact on navigation.
>
> Any chance of implementing https in a future release???

It's probably easiest to wrap it with an https proxy, then hopefully
the code for the web UI won't need to change.  I once did this for
another app using Apache's standard proxy module and https support.  I
forget the details though.

Brendan
